snippet: As Barbra Streisand prepares to perform for the first time in her old hometown, a look back at a student-made documentary that was -- yet wasn't -- about her.
abstract: As Barbra Streisand prepares to perform for the first time in her old hometown, a look back at a student-made documentary that was -- yet wasn't -- about her.

headline.main: Remembering a Film About Brooklynites Who Were All About Streisand
headline.print_headline: A Film About Streisand, or Brooklyn
